description: Tracks status changes of legal cases over time

status_change_id.description: Unique identifier for the status change

triggered_by_case_id.description: ID of case that triggered this status change

data_source.description: Source of this status change data

verified.description: Whether this status change has been manually verified

version.description: Version number for tracking updates to this status change

source_url.description: URL to source documenting this status change

changelog.description: Array of change records: [{version, date, changes, updated_by}]

constraints: CONSTRAINT unique_status_change_id IF NOT EXISTS FOR (sc:StatusChange) REQUIRE sc.status_change_id IS UNIQUE
indexes: CREATE INDEX status_change_date IF NOT EXISTS FOR (sc:StatusChange) ON (sc.change_date)
CREATE INDEX status_change_new_status IF NOT EXISTS FOR (sc:StatusChange) ON (sc.new_status)
CREATE INDEX status_change_previous_status IF NOT EXISTS FOR (sc:StatusChange) ON (sc.previous_status)
CREATE INDEX status_change_verified IF NOT EXISTS FOR (sc:StatusChange) ON (sc.verified)
CREATE INDEX status_change_source IF NOT EXISTS FOR (sc:StatusChange) ON (sc.source)
CREATE INDEX status_change_extracted_by IF NOT EXISTS FOR (sc:StatusChange) ON (sc.extracted_by)
CREATE INDEX status_change_trust_score IF NOT EXISTS FOR (sc:StatusChange) ON (sc.trust_score)
CREATE INDEX status_change_verification_status IF NOT EXISTS FOR (sc:StatusChange) ON (sc.verification_status)
